meta.title: 纵马江湖道,天涯任逍遥
meta.author: 风飞扬(windfly)

pages.text: 风飞扬个人博客 /* 幻灯片 */ .banner { height: 280px; width: 670px; overflow: hidden; } #slide-runner { height: 280px; width: 670px; overflow: hidden; position: absolute; } #slide-holder img { position: absolute; } #slide-controls { left: 0; bottom: 0px; width: 670px; height: 34px; display: none; position: absolute; background: url(pics/slide-bg.png) 0 0; } #slide-controls p.text { float: left; color: #fff; display: inline; line-height: 16px; margin: 10px 0 0 20px; } #slide-controls p#slide-nav { float: right; height: 24px; display: inline; margin: 5px 0px 0 0; } #slide-controls p#slide-nav a { float: left; width: 24px; height: 24px; display: inline; font-size: 11px; margin: 0 5px 0 0; line-height: 24px; text-align: center; color: #fff } #slide-controls p#slide-nav a.on { background-position: 0 -24px; } #slide-controls p#slide-nav a { background-image: url(pics/silde-nav.png); } 风飞扬 纵马江湖道，天涯任逍遥！ 首页 归档 分类 关于 思定则情忘，体虚则气运； 心死则神活，阳盛则阴消。 初感江湖险恶，刀光剑影， 或隐退于市？或肆意笑傲？ if (!window.slider) { var slider = {}; } slider.data = [ { "id": "slide-img-1", // 与slide-runner中的img标签id对应 "client": "", "desc": "天街小雨润如酥，草色遥看近却无。" //这里修改描述 }, { "id": "slide-img-2", "client": "", "desc": "梨花院落溶溶月，柳絮池塘淡淡风。" }, { "id": "slide-img-3", "client": "", "desc": "待到秋来九月八，我花开后百花杀。" }, { "id": "slide-img-4", "client": "", "desc": "梅须逊雪三分白，雪却输梅一段香。" } ];
